extracted_playbook.title: Update Firmware to Version 1.106 or Later
extracted_playbook.description: Update the firmware of MELSEC iQ-F Series FX5-ENET/IP to version 1.106 or later to fix the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Network Access
extracted_playbook.description: Use within a LAN and block access from untrusted networks and hosts through firewalls.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Physical Access
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict physical access to the product, as well as to computers and network devices located within the same network as the product.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Firewall or VPN for Internet Access
extracted_playbook.description: Use a firewall or virtual private network (VPN) to prevent unauthorized access when internet access is required.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement IP Filter Function
extracted_playbook.description: Use the IP filter function to block access from untrusted hosts. Refer to the MELSEC iQ-F FX5 User's Manual (Communication) for details.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize network exposure for all control system devices and/or systems, ensuring they are not accessible from the internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Isolate Control System Networks
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Methods for Remote Access
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use more secure methods, such as virtual private networks (VPNs), and ensure they are updated to the most current version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures and report findings to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.

cve_id: Mitsubishi Electric MELSEC iQ-F Series FX5-ENET/IP Vulnerability
